ygData.subject: Re: Charm
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It is broken.  Period.  Whoever disputes this is talking trash. John seems to use a wide variety of his songs and mixes them a lot as far as I can tell, I
ygData.messageBody:
>It *is* broken.

It is broken. Period. Whoever disputes this is talking trash.
John seems to use a wide variety of his songs and mixes them
a lot as far as I can tell, I trust his judgement over that
of someone's assumptions or <shiver> some damn enchanter.

Effects, message, monster still wails on me. And I'm not
talking clops or giants. I'm talking level 20 goblins.

One of the last few patches screwed this song up bad.

Harmonic Distortion, 40th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
